text:
="preserve">György Handel (20 March 1959 – 16 January 2021) was a Hungarian footballer. He played once for the Hungary national football team in 1987. His playing career lasted from 1973 to 1997. He played for Győri ETO and MTK Budapest.
Handel died on 16 January 2021 from COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Hungary, aged 61.
